aqrvA~g yaqj~jaH saM krA#matvaqmuShmAqdadhiq mAmaqBi | 
RuShI#NAqM ~MyaH puqrOhi#taH || 
nirdE#vaqM nirvI#raM kRuqtvA viShka#ndhaqM tasmi#n hIyatAqM ~MyO$&smAn dvEShTi# | 
SarI#raM ~Myaj~jaSamaqlaM kusI#daqM tasmin$thsIdatuq yO$&smAn dvEShTi# ||
yaj~ja# yaqj~jasyaq yat tEjaqstEnaq saMkrA#maq mAmaqBi | 
brAqhmaqNAnRuqtvijO# dEqvAn yaqj~jasyaq tapa#sA tE savAqhamA hu#vE ||
iqShTEna# paqkvamupa# - [  ] 30
